pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Interface ReservationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReservationDAOImpl

    public interface ReservationDAO
    Interface for performing database operations on Reservation objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary
